alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Sheridan County through 615 PM MDT... At 527 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from White Clay to 7 miles southwest of Rushville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Rushville, Hay Springs, Clinton, Highway 27 crossing the Niobrara River, Mount Maria, Walgren Lake State Recreation Area, Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area, and Pine Ridge. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 78 and 110. Highway 250 between mile markers 39 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
